i1.name: Contempt for the Weak
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Zed's''' [[basic attack]]s against targets {{sti|health|{{as|below 50% '''maximum''' health}}}} deal {{as|{{pp|3|key=%|6 to 10|1;7;17}} of target's '''maximum''' health}} as {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}. Against monsters, the damage is increased by 100%, but is capped at {{pp|3|200 to 500|1;7;17}}.
''Contempt for the Weak'' can only affect the same target once every few seconds.
i1.notes:
* The enhanced attack applies other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal but does not affect structures.
* ''Contempt for the Weak'' is not consumed when {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, or when ''Zed'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}, but it is consumed when {{ai|W|Shen|blocked}}.

q1.name: Razor Shuriken
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' throw their spinning blades toward the target location. Each blade deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies struck, reduced to 60% against units beyond the first.
q1.notes:
* ''Razor Shuriken'' has been special cased to apply a stack of {{ri|Electrocute}} for each ''Shuriken'' hit.
* A {{tip|spell shield}} may block multiple ''Razor Shurikens'' if they strike at the same time.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|80 to 220}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Secondary Damage|{{ap|80*0.6 to 220*0.6}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD)
  • Secondary Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD)

w1.name: Living Shadow
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Zed's''' [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' dashes in the target direction, remaining in place for 5 seconds and being able to mimic ''{{ai|Razor Shuriken}}'' and ''{{ai|Shadow Slash}}'' while in range of each other.
'''Zed''' restores {{sti|{{as|energy}}}} whenever a [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' lands a mimicked ability on the same target he does. This may only happen once per cast ability.
{{sbc|Second Cast - Shadow Swap:}} While in range of each other, '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' {{tip|blink}} to their respective locations, swapping places.

e1.name: Shadow Slash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' slash, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to surrounding enemies.

Enemies hit by a [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow's'' ''Shadow Slash'' are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but the slow's potency is increased by 50%.
Each enemy champion hit by '''Zed's''' slash reduces ''{{ais|Living Shadow}}'' {{stil|cooldown}} by 2 seconds.
e1.notes: * ''Shadow Slash'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Zed's''' previous orders.

r1.name: Death Mark
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Zed''' becomes {{tip|untargetable}} for {{fd|0.6}} seconds after which he {{tip|dashes}} through the target enemy {{tip|champion|champion}} over {{fd|0.4}} seconds, {{as|'''marking'''|buzzword}} them, becoming {{tip|ghosted}} for 3 seconds, and spawning a [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' at the cast location which lasts for {{fd|6.5}} seconds. After {{fd|0.5}} seconds of his reappearance, he can activate ''{{ai|Death Mark 2||Death Mark Shadow}}''.

For the next 3 seconds, the {{as|'''mark'''|buzzword}} stores a percentage of all {{tt|pre-mitigation|Damage calculated before modifiers}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} and {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magical damage}}}} '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' deal to the target, detonating at the end of the duration to deal {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}.

{{sbc|Second Cast - Death Mark Shadow:}} Regardless of distance between each other, '''Zed''' and the ''Death Mark'' [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' {{tip|blink}} to their respective locations, swapping places.
''If the target dies or is 1950 units away before the dash begins, Death Mark is canceled, goes on a 5 second {{sti|cooldown}}, and '''Zed''' reappears at the cast location.''
r1.notes:
* The {{as|'''mark'''|buzzword}} can be prevented by becoming {{tip|untargetable}} before it is applied (untargetability after application will not prevent the mark's detonation).
* ''Death Mark's'' [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' is functionally the same as a regular one, but it lasts longer and can be recast regardless of range.
** The range at which they mimic '''Zed's''' abilities do not change.
* ''Death Mark's'' stored damage derives from all [[Champion ability|abilities]], [[item]]s, and [[buff]]s.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will only block the {{as|'''mark's'''|buzzword}} application. They will not block the detonation from a {{as|'''mark'''|buzzword}} that is already applied.
* If the {{as|'''mark'''|buzzword}} is strong enough to kill the target, a ''spinning shuriken'' will appear above the victim to indicate their death. This does not however consider {{tip|shield|shields}} or forms of [[damage modifier]]s.
[[File:Spinning_Shuriken_Indicator.png|thumb|left|225px|The indicator shown in-game ''(base skin)''.]]

effects.str: • Physical Damage: 100% AD (+ % of damage dealt)
